title: Squire

properties.value: Squire Asrol is the squire of Sir Vyvin and can be found in the courtyard of the White Knights' Castle. Speaking to him starts the The Knight's Sword quest, in which he is heavily involved. He works hard but is often worried that his mistakes will anger his knight.

This article is about the quest NPC. For other squires, see Squire (disambiguation).
Squire

Advanced data
NPC ID4737

Squire Asrol is the squire of Sir Vyvin and can be found in the courtyard of the White Knights' Castle. Speaking to him starts the The Knight's Sword quest, in which he is heavily involved. He works hard but is often worried that his mistakes will anger his knight.

Contents

  • 1 Treasure Trails
  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 4 Trivia

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • The Squire is the solution to the medium anagram clue: QUE SIR. The answer to his challenge: White knights are superior to black knights. 2 white knights can handle 3 black knights. How many knights do we need for an army of 981 black knights is: 654.
  • The squire is the solution to the easy cryptic clue: Talk to the Squire in the White Knights' castle in Falador.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
Transcripts Squire speaks in:
  • Transcript of 2021 Christmas event
  • Transcript of The Knight's Sword

Changes[edit | edit source]

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]

29 March 2004 –
20 February 2006 		20 February 2006 –
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The squire's name, Asrol, is only shown when getting a challenge scroll from him. It was previously mentioned in the 2017 Birthday event after successfully pairing him with Sir Vyvin, as well as in the brief abstract for the 2021 Christmas event news post.
  • The squire was a major character in the 2021 Christmas event, in which he had accidentally painted Sir Vyvin's armour pink. During this time, he was given a festive graphical override wearing a santa hat and santa outfit.
